subject: Very confidential message
body:
Very confidential message
Good morning from Nigeria. If you\'re alive and you\'re reading this
email then I might have some very good news for you.
I am Albert Sajid, the newly appointed Confidential Secretary to
governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria. While going through the old
files that my boss inherited from his predecessor, I saw a record in
your name for a payment in the value of US$23.5 which was claimed was
for a contract executed for one of my government agencies.
I don\'t know if you may be aware of this but it is a fact. In my
country, so many strange things happen among government and public
servants and only those who are well connected can be aware.
In my present position, as the Confidential Secretary to the governor,
I can convince my boss and he will conveniently approve the release of
this payment to you as recorded but only through the due process and
we will share the funds 50% apiece after you may have received the
payment.
This can only be possible if you can be sincere and discreet about it
without mentioning my plan to anyone.
If you may not be interested then simply say so. However, this money
is sitting freely and easily to be claimed.
I need a private and direct telephone number by which I can reach you.
I NEED TO SPEAK WITH YOU DIRECTLY.
Waiting to hear from you so I can start the plan immediately.
Yours sincerely,
Albert Sajid

subject: Re:   Very confidential message
body:
Good morning! Thank you for reaching out with this information. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Can you please provide more details about the process for claiming the payment? How can we ensure that everything is done through the proper channels?

Best wishes,
Kyle

subject: Re: Very confidential message. Proper channels
body:
Kyle

Thank you for your response.

Right now, I will need to retrieve the approvals from  both the
Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) and the Nigerian National Petroleum
Corporation (NNPC), which must be submitted to the Telex department
for immediate release of your funds. To get the above approvals, I
will need the following current details asap.

Full names
Company/Business name if any
Current contact address
Telephone number
Nationality
Bank name
Bank address
Account number
Routing #

Once I receive the above, I will retrieve the two mentioned approvals,
send copies to you then drop the hard copies with the bank for
immediate release of your funds.

Kindly revert as quickly as possible. I assure you that with my
office, everything will work out fine. Please understand that team
work is very important here, you and I should ensure every procedure
is followed with all commitments, both time and in resources so see
that this deal is concluded thereafter we share the proceeds 50/50.

Waiting to hear from you so I can start the plan immediately.

Yours sincerely,

Albert

subject: Re: Very confidential message. Proper channels
body:
Hello Kyle,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in helping with the process. Could you please clarify what specific funds you are referring to and how this process will benefit me? Additionally, do you have a direct contact number or email where I can reach you for further communication?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kyle
